properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana twaomba upokee
sadaka yetu hii tunayokutolea.
Twakusihi sana ibariki baba iwe
safi sana iwe kama ile ya Abeli.
Twakusihi sana ibariki baba iwe
safi sana iwe kama ile ya Abeli.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Baba twaleta mkate na divai
kazi ya mikono yetu Baba.
Ibariki Baba iwe safi sana
iwe kama ile ya Abeli.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Baba twaleta na fedha zetu
japo ni kidogo sana Baba.
Zipokee Baba zikupendeze
ziwe kama zile za Abeli.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Baba twaleta na sala zetu,
Baba twakuomba zisikilize.
Twakusihi sana zisikilize
kama sala zile za Abeli.
